_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Interior factors that are harmful or ben: Pursuing bad habits and not good habits
Pursuing good habits and not bad habits
Actions that lead to the decline and dis: Pursuing bad habits and not good habits
Pursuing good habits and not bad habits
Actions that make the true teaching disa: Explaining what is not the teaching as the teaching
Explaining what is the teaching as not the teaching
Explaining what is not found in the monastic law as found in the monastic law
Explaining what is found in the monastic law as not found in the monastic law
Explaining what was not spoken and stated by the Realized One as spoken and stated by the Realized One
Explaining what was spoken and stated by the Realized One as not spoken and stated by the Realized One
Explaining what was not practiced by the Realized One as practiced by the Realized One
Explaining what was practiced by the Realized One as not practiced by the Realized One
Explaining what was not prescribed by the Realized One as prescribed by the Realized One
Explaining what was prescribed by the Realized One as not prescribed by the Realized One
